title: Creates a subpart of the housing part to handle cases involving condominiums and cooperative buildings
summary: Creates a special subpart of the housing part within the NYC civil court to handle cases involving condominiums and cooperative buildings.
lawSection: New York City Civil Court Act
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          797

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. DINOWITZ, JACOBS, V. LOPEZ, COLTON -- Multi-Spon-
         sored  by  --  M. of A.   FARRELL, PHEFFER, J. RIVERA -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Housing

       AN ACT to amend the New York city civil court act, in relation to estab-
         lishing a subpart to hear housing matters related to  cooperative  and
         condominium buildings

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 110 of the New York city civil court act is amended
    2  by adding a new subdivision (q) to read as follows:
    3    (Q) A SEPARATE SUBPART OF THE HOUSING PART ESTABLISHED BY THIS SECTION
    4  SHALL BE DEVOTED TO ACTIONS AND PROCEEDINGS  INVOLVING  COOPERATIVE  AND
    5  CONDOMINIUM BUILDINGS FOR SUCH MATTERS WHICH ARE WITHIN THE JURISDICTION
    6  OF THE HOUSING PART.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
    8  it shall have become a law.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04333-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city civil court act, in relation to establishing a subpart to hear housing matters related to cooperative and condominium buildings
